text: unase us bastee ke vishay mein poochho jo saagar-tat par thee. jab ve sabt ke maamale mein seema ka ullanghan karate the, jab unake sabt ke din unakee machhaliyaan khule taur par paanee ke oopar aa jaatee thee aur jo din unake sabt ka na hota to ve unake paas na aatee thee. is prakaar unake avagyaakaaree hone ke kaaran ham unako pareeksha mein daal rahe the
